Operation and Maintenance and Security Teams Manager of IT Security Sr Information Security Analyst Mitsubishi Nuclear Energy Systems September 2011 to December 2013 Developed and implemented training plan for new and existing employees reduced training cost by 65K Conducted vendor management and negotiated the update and renewal of enterprise software resulted in a 66 cost reduction for the enterprise Provided oversight of security operations including delivering technical direction for the team and internal business units in addition to the evaluation of security network hardware and software solutions to identify threats reduce vulnerabilities and manage risk Healthcare Information Security Analyst Childrens National Medical Center September 2010 to August 2011 Led the deployment of endpoint security solution for over 6500 computer systems in a 247365 critical operating environment exceeded the organizations goal to support 11 branch locations Developed IT strategies to ensure the business infrastructure met existing and future requirements based on security needs and regulations Performed risk assessments to ensure servers and workstations vulnerabilities were appropriately patches and secured to prevent system attacks and conducted audit investigations of infected endpoints and performed appropriate remediation Network Security Engineer ICF Macro International June 2008 to August 2010 Eradicated inaccurate and obsolete network traffic rules on enterprise firewall reduced network intrusions by 20 and oversaw protection of the organizations communications network valued at 100M and supporting 1000 customers Developed course of action and led the upgrade to consolidate outdated firewalls to reduce hardware footprint and management overhead and assisted with SOX Compliance Audit Performed monthly and quarterly vulnerability scans of the network to eliminate andor minimize the threat of intrusions or hostile attack to include
